pages.index: Enter the Thunder Strike Arena: The Ultimate Fantasy eSports Experience Home About Us How to play FAQ'S Experience a new gaming experience with Thunder Strike Play a fantasy game in the world of eSports to feel like a real professional GET APP LINK About Us Electronic sports or e-sports is a relatively new field that is rapidly gaining popularity among young people around the world. With the growing interest in video games and streaming, gaming has become not only entertainment, but also a serious competitive sport that requires high concentration, reaction, tactics and teamwork. On the Fantasy eSports Thunder Strike website, we offer a unique opportunity to delve into the world of eSports, create your own team rosters, fight with friends or participate in tournaments with other players. You can predict game results and take interesting tests to earn points and rise in the rankings. We strive to create a friendly community of eSports fans, where everyone will find a place and be able to demonstrate their skills and abilities. Here you can discuss the latest eSports news, share strategies and tactics, learn from the example of professional players and just have a good time in the company of like-minded people. We also offer you a unique opportunity to connect with other players, share experiences and help each other build better teams. On our website you can find many forums, chats and communities where you can communicate with like-minded people, share your successes and discuss new strategies. One of the main advantages of our site is the ability to play with friends. You can create a team with your friends and fight together in tournaments and competitions. This is a great opportunity to have a fun and exciting time with friends. In addition, our website regularly hosts tournaments with valuable prizes and unforgettable experiences. You will be able to test yourself in battles with the best players in the world and earn a reputation as one of the best commanders. If you are passionate about the world of eSports, want to keep abreast of all the events and participate in exciting competitions, then welcome to our website! We are open to everyone who shares our passion and is ready to join our Thunder Strike esports team. Let's work together to make eSports even more exciting and exciting! Benefits of Thunder Strike 1. Ability to create your own team compositions. Users can assemble teams of professional players or invite their friends to play together. 2. Play with friends. The site offers the opportunity to create a lobby and invite friends to play various eSports disciplines together. This is a great way to spend time with friends and improve your gaming skills. 3. Participation in tournaments. Thunder Strike holds regular tournaments for various eSports games, where users can compete with opponents and compete for valuable prizes and rating points. 4. Forecasting the results of eSports games. Users can place bets on the results of eSports matches and competitions, which adds excitement and interest to the competition. 5. Passing tests and earning points. The site offers various eSports tests and quizzes, for completing which users can earn points and increase their ranking on the site. How to start playing Thunder Strike 1. Install the application and register Install the Thunder Strike app on your device and go through the registration process to create an account. 2. Assemble a team Gather your team of professional eSports players or friends with whom you want to play in tournaments. 3. Play in tournaments Take part in various tournaments and competitions, showing your skills and game strategy. 4. Monitor the progress of your team Keep track of your team's progress and personal achievements through statistics and ratings on the site. 5. Receive prizes and achievements Receive valuable prizes for victories in tournaments, participation in special promotions and achievements in the game. Upcoming matches Cyberninja VS Digital Samurai Date: May 15, 2022 Time: 18:00 Description: These will be two strong teams consisting of virtual ninjas and samurai who fight in an exciting game on mobile devices. Both teams are highly skilled and strategic. Game name: Mobile Ninja-Samurai Showdown GET APP LINK Electronic Dragons VS Digital Vikings Date: May 20, 2022 Time: 20:00 Description: These two teams of virtual dragons and Vikings will face off in an epic battle in a fantasy world. The game will be filled with dynamic battles and stunning graphics. Game name: Fantasy Dragon-Viking Clash GET APP LINK Cyberpirates VS Digital Cowboys Date: May 25, 2022 Time: 16:00 Description: In this match, virtual pirates and cowboys will clash in the vastness of cyberspace. Each team will use unique tactics and techniques to win. Game name: Cyber ​​Pirate-Cowboy Showdown. GET APP LINK FAQ 1. How to create your squad on the Thunder Strike website? To create your squad on the Thunder Strike website, you need to register, then go to the “Squads” section and click the “Create a new squad” button. After that, select the players from the list and name your squad. 2. How to play with friends on the Thunder Strike website? To play with friends on the Thunder Strike website, you need to create a team and invite friends to it. After this, you can arrange matches with other teams and compete for prizes. 3. How to participate in tournaments on the Thunder Strike website? To participate in tournaments on the Thunder Strike website, you need to register, create a team and register for the tournament. After this, you should follow the rules of the tournament and compete with other participants. 4. How to predict the results of eSports games on the Thunder Strike website? To predict the results of eSports games on the Thunder Strike website, you need to register, select the match you are interested in and make a prediction on its outcome. If your prediction is correct, you will earn points. 5. How to take tests on the Thunder Strike website? To take tests on the Thunder Strike website, you need to register, select the desired test and answer the questions. After completing the test, you will receive the result and the opportunity to earn points. 6. How to earn points on the Thunder Strike website? You can earn points on the Thunder Strike website for participating in tournaments, predicting game results, passing tests and completing other tasks. Points can be used to purchase various items and participate in various promotions. 7. What prizes can you get for points on the Thunder Strike website? For points on the Thunder Strike website, you can get various prizes, such as in-game items, gift cards, discounts on partner services and much more. 8. What games can be predicted on the Thunder Strike website? On the Thunder Strike website you can predict game results for various types of e-sports, such as Dota 2, CS:GO, League of Legends, Overwatch and other popular games. 9. What bonuses are provided for winning tournaments on the Thunder Strike website? For winning tournaments on the Thunder Strike website, you can receive various bonuses, such as prize money, bonus points, as well as the opportunity to participate in larger and more prestigious tournaments. 10. What opportunities are available for teams on the Thunder Strike website? Teams on the Thunder Strike website are given the opportunity to create their own rosters, participate in tournaments, play with other teams, earn points and receive various prizes for winning competitions. Please participate responsibly and be aware of your own limits. 18+
pages.policy: Privacy Policy for Thunder Strike Fantasy eSports Game Website Home About Us How to play FAQ'S Privacy Policy At Thunder Strike, we take your privacy and the security of your personal information very seriously. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect the information you provide to us when using our website and playing our fantasy eSports games. Please read this policy carefully to understand how we handle your data. 1. Information We Collect When you visit our website or play our fantasy eSports games, we may collect the following types of information: - Personal Information: This includes your name, email address, date of birth, and other details you provide when creating an account on our platform. - Payment Information: When you make transactions on our website, such as purchasing in-game currency or upgrades, we may collect billing information such as credit card details or other payment methods. - Usage Information: We collect data on your browsing activity on our website, such as pages visited, time spent on each page, and interactions with our games. - Device Information: We may collect information about the device you use to access our platform, such as IP address, browser type, and operating system. 2. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect for the following purposes: - To provide and improve our services: We use your data to deliver our fantasy eSports games and enhance your gaming experience on our platform. - To personalize your experience: We may use your information to tailor the content and features of our website and games to your preferences. - To process payments: We use your payment information to facilitate transactions on our platform and ensure secure payment processing. - To communicate with you: We may send you updates, newsletters, and other information related to our services and promotions. - To analyze and improve our platform: We use data analytics to understand how users interact with our website and games and make improvements based on user feedback. 3. How We Protect Your Information We implement robust security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. This includes encryption, firewalls, and other security protocols to safeguard your data. 4. Sharing Your Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent. However, we may share your data with trusted partners and service providers who assist us in operating our platform and delivering our services. 5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We use cookies and other tracking technologies to collect data on your browsing behavior and preferences. These technologies help us personalize your experience, analyze trends, and improve our website and games. 6. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites, services, and advertisements. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third parties, so we recommend reviewing their privacy policies before interacting with them. 7. Children's Privacy Our website and games are not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children, and if we become aware of such data being provided by a child, we will promptly delete it from our records. 8. Changes to This Privacy Policy We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the revised policy on our website. Your continued use of our platform after the changes will constitute acceptance of the updated policy. 9. Contact Us If you have any questions, concerns, or feedback regarding our Privacy Policy or the handling of your personal information, please contact us at thunderstrike@gmail.com. By using our website and playing our fantasy eSports games, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. Thank you for trusting Thunder Strike with your data. Home About Us How to play FAQ'S Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions Cookies Policy DISCLAIMER This game includes a risk of financial loss and has the potential to become addictive. Please participate responsibly and be aware of your own limits. 18+
pages.terms: Terms of Use for the Thunder Strike Fantasy eSports Game Website Home About Us How to play FAQ'S Terms & Conditions Welcome to Thunder Strike, the ultimate destination for fantasy eSports games. You must provide accurate and complete information when registering, and you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account. 3. Age Restriction You must be at least 18 years old to use Thunder Strike. Third-Party Links Thunder Strike may contain links to third-party websites for your convenience. We do not endorse or control the content of these websites, and we are not responsible for any damages or losses incurred by visiting these links. 9. Limitation of Liability To the fullest extent permitted by law, Thunder Strike is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our website. 10. Indemnification You agree to indemnify and hold Thunder Strike harmless from any claims, damages, or losses resulting from your breach of these Terms of Use. 11. Governing Law These Terms of Use are governed by the laws of the United States. Any disputes arising from these terms will be resolved through arbitration in accordance with the rules of the American Arbitration Association. 12. Contact Information If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms of Use, please contact us at thunderstrike@gmail.com. By using Thunder Strike, you agree to abide by these Terms of Use. pages.cookies: Thunder Strike Fantasy eSports Game Cookies Policy Home About Us How to play FAQ'S Cookies Policy Last updated: July 1, 2021 This Cookies Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and your choices regarding cookies on our website. What are cookies? Cookies are small pieces of data stored on your device (computer, tablet, smartphone) when you visit a website. They are used to remember your preferences, improve your user experience, and provide anonymized tracking data to website owners. How do we use cookies? We use cookies for a variety of purposes, including: 1. Essential cookies: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies. 2. Performance cookies: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This allows us to improve the performance of our website and make it more user-friendly. 3. Functionality cookies: These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization. They may be set by us or third-party providers whose services we have added to our pages. 4. Targeting cookies: These cookies are used to deliver content that is more relevant to you and your interests. They may be set by us or third-party advertising partners to build a profile of your interests and show you personalized ads on other websites. What cookies do we use? We use both session cookies and persistent cookies on our website. Session cookies are temporary cookies that are erased when you close your browser, while persistent cookies remain on your device for a set period of time or until you delete them. We also use first-party cookies, which are set by the website you are visiting, and third-party cookies, which are set by a domain other than the one you are visiting. We use Google Analytics to analyze website traffic and improve our website performance. Your choices regarding cookies You can choose to accept or decline cookies on our website at any time by changing your browser settings. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your settings to decline cookies if you prefer. However, this may prevent you from taking full advantage of the website. If you do not want us to use cookies, you can opt-out by adjusting your browser settings or using the opt-out tool provided by the relevant third party. Please note that opting out of cookies may impact your experience on our website. Changes to this Cookies Policy We may update this Cookies Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We encourage you to check this page regularly for any updates. Contact us If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this Cookies Policy, please contact us at thunderstrike@gmail.com. Thank you for visiting Thunder Strike Fantasy eSports Games website!
